mapper.insert: insert into review(reviewRating, reviewComment, shopNo, resNo ,fileName ,fileSize ) values(#{reviewRating},#{reviewComment},#{shopNo},#{resNo} ,#{fileName},#{fileSize} );
mapper.select: select count(1) from (select rv.reviewComment, rv.reviewRating, u.uiId, group_concat(concat(m.menuName,rm.resMenuCnt,'개') separator ' , ') as menuName, rv.reviewNo, r.resNo, r.resDate, rv.fileName, rv.adminComment from review rv, reservation r, user_info u , reservationmenu rm, menu m where rv.shopNo = #{shopNo} and rv.resNo = r.resNo and rv.resNo = rm.resNo and rm.menuNo = m.menuNo and r.uiNo = u.uiNo group by rv.reviewNo) reviewTotal;
mapper.update: update review set adminComment = #{adminComment} where reviewNo = #{reviewNo};
